text: Niscaya karuna chila musara sampradayabhukta, kintu se tadera prati aud'dhatya prakasa karechila. Ara amara take dana karechilama emana dhanabhandara yara cabigulo bahana kara ekadala balabana lokera pakse'o kastasadhya chila.
